General.Name: Zhongtai Securities Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongtai Securities Co., Ltd. offers securities brokerage services in China. It provides wealth and asset management services; financing and financial advisory services for corporate and institutional customers, including equity financing, bond financing, asset securitization, mergers and acquisitions, innovative financing, and market value management; and margin financing and securities lending, refinancing, securities trading, stock pledged repurchase trading, and equity incentive exercise financing services. The company also offers research consulting services; custody, outsourcing, operation, and institutional brokerage, and derivatives support, securities source support, and fund-raising services, as well as financial technology services. In addition, it provides proprietary securities; fixed income and other private equity products; risk and compliance management services; underwriting and sponsorship, investment and financial consulting, margin trading, fund and financial product agency sales, fund custody, futures, and other services. The company was formerly known as Qilu Securities Co., Ltd. Zhongtai Securities Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Jinan, China.
